title: Danshi Koukousei Ga Mahou Shoujo Ni Naru Hanashi
alternative_title: The Story of High School Boys Who Became Magical Girls ; 男子高校生が魔法少女になる話
status: The Story of High School Boys Who Became Magical Girls ; 男子高校生が魔法少女になる話
description:
Description :
        It is said that students chosen by the giant tree standing in the courtyard of Yurigasaki Academy are granted the 'magical power to defeat evil.' Guided by this mysterious legend, five magical girls have now gathered, but an unbelievable truth awaits…!? The long-awaited serialization of the one of a kind magical girl gag story presented by the genius Konkichi that caused a huge stir on social media!
